definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Write the item on the top of the piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 在價格表的頂部寫上商品名稱。

sentences.english: We enclose our new catalogue and price list.
sentences.chinese: 謹謝上新的商品目錄和價格表。

sentences.english: Does your store have a catalog listing books and their prices?
sentences.chinese: 你們書店有沒有售書的目錄和價格表？

sentences.english: It would also be appreciated if you could forward samples and your price list to us.
sentences.chinese: 如能惠寄樣本和價格表，亦必感謝不盡。

sentences.english: Prices are indicated in details in the Schedule of Prices in Tender Form.
sentences.chinese: 價格應在投標書價格表中詳細標明。

sentences.english: This price applies to the Spa course and the Sun River course.
sentences.chinese: 此價格表適用於溫泉球場和太陽河球場。

sentences.english: Airmail revised price list but full range sample within fortnight .
sentences.chinese: 航空寄上訂正價格表，全套樣品兩週內寄出。

sentences.english: Please refer to the enclosed price-list and order form.
sentences.chinese: 本函附有價格表和訂購單。

sentences.english: Keep all the price lists on file for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 把所有的價格表存檔，以便今後備查。

sentences.english: Enclosed please find the catalogue and price list you asked for.
sentences.chinese: 隨函寄上的是你方所需的目錄和價格表。

sentences.english: Will you please send us your price list or catalogue?
sentences.chinese: 請把你們的價格表或目錄寄給我們好嗎？

sentences.english: We take the liberty to enclose herewith sample and a price - list of the new season cotton fabric .
sentences.chinese: 茲奉上新季棉織物樣品與價格表，請參考。

sentences.english: I enclose our new price list , which will come into effect , from the end of this month.
sentences.chinese: 現謹附上本公司新價格表，新價格將於底生效。

sentences.english: It's shown in the price list.
Would you please send us catalogue, your price-list, together with the sample of your products?
sentences.chinese: 你能惠寄貴公司產品的目錄，價格表和樣品嗎？

sentences.english: This is the pricelist, but it serves as a guideline only.
sentences.chinese: 這是價格表，但只供參考。

definition: odd number (on a ticket, house etc)
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
